basics.name: Raeanna Vance
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.A. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaiʻi at Mānoa. I expect to graduate in Spring 2027, then continue with an M.L.I.S. in Library Science.

education.institution: University of Hawaiʻi at Mānoa, Honolulu, HI
Leeward Community College, Pearl City, HI

work.name: Navy Exchange Command
work.summary: Assist customers in finding products; support day-to-day operations.
highlights: Operate cash registers, stock shelves, and maintain a clean and safe environment.

work.name: United States Navy
highlights: Supervised and trained personnel in the operation and maintenance of Ship Self Defense System (SSDS) weapons systems.

volunteer.organization: The Pantry by Feeding Hawaiʻi Together
highlights: Update laptop systems and software, troubleshoot network issues.
Assist with food distribution and other tasks as needed.

awards.title: University Published Artist
awards.summary: Selected as one of the Hawaiian Studies artists to have artwork displayed.
